users.vDesc: Always have high hopes for a livin

items.markText: ‚ÄúNo matter how dreary and gray our homes are, we people of flesh and blood would rather live there than in any other country, be it ever so beautiful. There is no place like home.‚Äù
Experience is the only thing that brings knowledge, and the longer you are on earth the more experience you are sure to get.
Brains are the only things worth having in this world, no matter whether one is a crow or a man.
There is no living thing that is not afraid when it faces danger. True courage is in facing danger when you are afraid, and that kind of courage you have in plenty.‚Äù
One glance told her of the danger close at hand.
for brains do not make one happy, and happiness is the best thing in the world.

In this country everyone must pay for everything he gets.
had they not felt so sorry for the poor Scarecrow they could have been very happy.
